tweets.text: ü§ñ Robot News Report 02/06/2023 - the robot had a pretty hard time making a news report that made sense today, but I think that's more our fault. It would not stop shoehorning this dolphin skull story into completely inappropriate places https://t.co/3hjo6KsdrX
